snippet.title: Distant Kingdoms | Demo Let's Play
snippet.description:
Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1090760/Distant_Kingdoms/
Kasedo Games’ Product Manager, Christian Woolford, plays through the newly released Demo of Distant Kingdoms as part of the Steam Game’s Festival, February 2021 edition. Distant Kingdoms is coming to Early Access soon, in Q2 of this year. 
--------------------------------------------------------
Social Media
--------------------------------------------------------
Follow us on Twitter @DistantKingdoms: https://twitter.com/DistantKingdoms
Talk to the devs on the Distant Kingdoms Discord: discord.gg/DistantKingdoms
--------------------------------------------------------
About Us
--------------------------------------------------------
About Kasedo Games
Kasedo Games is the 'digital first' - Division of Kalypso Media. The Kasedo Games label is committed to publishing high-quality games, developed by handpicked and highly talented Indie developers. Titles published under the Kasedo label include: 'Filament', 'Warhammer 40,000: Mechanicus', 'Rise of Industry', 'Project Highrise' and ‘Crowntakers’. www.kasedogames.com
